channel.title: Private Server Problem
channel.description:
Ok I have set up a server using No-ip.com and I have jdk 5.0 and I have edited the codes but when i go to load the .bat file I get an error saying [code]error: cannot read: *.java 1 error exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server[/code]
Can anyone help me please?

item.title: Private Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @Pariah Pariah
item.description:
@Pariah wrote:

I have tried that many times in many different ways but it still bring sup the same error. What now?

Read full topic

item.title: Private Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @mmmmmm mmmmmm
item.description:
@mmmmmm wrote:

whats you do is this.

you right click your compile option and click edit

delete everything in there and when i say everything…everything and when you replace it where it says YOURSERVERNAME put ur server name just babaascape not babaascape.no-ip and replace it with this [ex do not use babaascape use ur server name]

@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAME Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java” server
pause

have fun m8 =]

Read full topic
